mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO lottery.t_betting ( f_id, f_user_id, f_user_name, f_period, f_betting_time, f_lottery_id, f_project, f_odds, f_money ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.userId}, #{item.userName}, #{item.period}, #{item.bettingTime}, #{item.lotteryId}, #{item.project}, #{item.odds}, #{item.money} )
mapper.select: SELECT f_lottery_id, f_period, f_project, count(f_project) as f_count FROM t_betting WHERE f_lottery_id = #{lotteryId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND f_period = #{period, jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY f_project

SELECT b.f_id, b.f_user_name, b.f_period, b.f_betting_time, l.f_name AS f_lottery_name, p.f_name AS f_project_name, b.f_odds, b.f_money, b.f_square, f_square_money, b.f_square_time FROM t_betting AS b LEFT JOIN t_lottery AS l ON b.f_lottery_id = l.f_id LEFT JOIN t_project AS p ON b.f_project = p.f_id WHERE b.f_lottery_id = #{lotteryId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND b.f_user_name = #{acc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b.f_betting_time >= #{startTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND b.f_betting_time <= #{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ORDER BY b.f_id

SELECT f_user_name, sum(f_money) AS f_bet_money, sum(case when f_square_money < 0 then f_square_money else 0 end) AS f_loss FROM t_betting WHERE f_lottery_id = #{lotteryId, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND f_user_name = #{acc, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND f_square = 1 AND f_betting_time >= #{startTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND f_betting_time <= #{endTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY f_user_name
mapper.update: UPDATE t_betting SET f_square_money = #{squareMoney, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, f_square = 1, f_square_time = #{squareTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE f_id = #{bettingId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

update.foreach: UPDATE t_betting SET f_square_money = #{item.squareMoney}, f_square = 1, f_square_time = #{item.squareTime} WHERE f_id = #{item.bettingId}
